extension.name: com.janadri.processors.nats.GetNatsWithHeaders
extension.description: Fetches messages from a NATS Messaging Topic. Supports protobuf-encoded messages and NATS headers.

property.name: Known Brokers
property.description: A comma-separated list of known NATS Brokers in the format nats://<host>:<port>

property.name: Topic Name
property.description: The NATS Topic to subscribe to

property.name: Batch Size
property.description: Maximum number of messages to receive in a single batch

relationship.name: success
relationship.description: FlowFiles containing received NATS messages are routed here

writesAttribute.name: nats.topic
writesAttribute.description: The NATS topic from which the message was received

writesAttribute.name: nats.header.*
writesAttribute.description: Any headers present in the NATS message will be added with this prefix
